title: The Club Princess
description: When your step-father is the president of a motorcycle club and your step-brother is next in line to take over, you become accustomed to being an afterthought. But I didn't expect them to forget my eighteenth birthday.Hurt and angry, I give them an me join the club or I skip town. They come up with their own plan. Keep me forever... by any means necessary.The Club Princess is a MFM stepfather/stepbrother erotic romance.
author: B. Sobjakken
